long_description: The Salomon Fellraiser trail-running shoes boast a lightweight chassis, weather- and muck-resistant uppers and aggressive outsoles for trail races and training in wet and muddy conditions. Water-resistant, tightly woven nylon mesh uppers with are lightweight, flexible, quick drying and highly breathable for race-ready performance. Synthetic thermoplastic urethane overlays and heel slings cradle feet for a precise, supportive fit; abrasion-resistant toe caps protect uppers and keep toes safe from bumps. Quicklace(TM) lacing system ensures a secure and customized fit: just pull, lock the toggle and go; pockets on tongues store laces out of the way. Polyester mesh linings enhance comfort and wick moisture away from feet. Removable Ortholite(R) footbeds enhance comfort by adding shock absorption; antimicrobial treatment deters odors. Midsole design offers EVA padding for excellent stability, cushioning and rebound throughout your stride; lowered ride in heel enhances natural stability. Salomon Fellraiser trail-running shoes have low-profile, nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles with multidirectional lugs and sticky rubber for great traction in mud.
short_description: The Salomon Fellraiser trail-running shoes boast a lightweight chassis, weather- and muck-resistant uppers and aggressive outsoles for trail races and training in wet and muddy conditions.
